metadata.dc:author: Duménigo Ripoll, B
Quintana Olmos, R
Hormilla Manso, G
Bouza Suárez, M
Cordovi Prado, R
metadata.dc:description: The first certainty case of Diphyllobothrium latum in Cuba, is described. The diagnosis is based on the identification of proglottids, which shows the typical characteristics of this cestode.
metadata.dc:title: Primer caso de certeza de Diphyllobothrium latum en Cuba.
[The first certain case of Diphyllobothrium latum in Cuba].
